trans-unit.source: Represents a claim for a <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken"></xref> security token that asserts that the subject was authenticated by a particular means at a particular time.
trans-unit.target: Representerer et krav for en <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken"> </xref> sikkerhetstokenet som deklarasjoner at emnet ble godkjent av en bestemt betyr på et bestemt tidspunkt.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken> security tokens specify their claims using SAML assertions, which can specify when the subject was authenticated.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken>sikkerhetstokener angi deres ved hjelp av SAML deklarasjoner, som kan angi når emnet ble godkjent krav.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken>

trans-unit.source: The claims in a SAML assertion are represented by SAML statements.
trans-unit.target: Krav i SAML-deklarasjonen representeres av SAML-setninger.

trans-unit.source: The SAML specification defines a set of SAML statement types and one of them is a SamlAuthenticationStatement.
trans-unit.target: SAML spesifikasjonen definerer et sett med SAML setningen typer og én av dem er SamlAuthenticationStatement.

trans-unit.source: A SamlAuthenticationStatement asserts that the statement's subject was authenticated by a particular means at a particular time.
trans-unit.target: SamlAuthenticationStatement deklarasjoner at den setningen emne ble godkjent av en bestemt betyr på et bestemt tidspunkt.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement"></xref> class using the specified authentication details.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement"> </xref> klasse ved hjelp av angitte godkjenning informasjonen.

trans-unit.source: The set of authentication methods is extensible; however the following table contains the set of authentication methods defined in the SAML specification.
trans-unit.target: Godkjenningsmetoder er omfattende; tabellen nedenfor inneholder imidlertid settet med godkjenningsmetoder som er definert i SAML-spesifikasjonen.

trans-unit.source: |Authentication method|URI| |---------------------------|---------| |Password|urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.0:am:password| |Kerberos|urn:ietf:rfc:1510| |Secure Remote Password (SRP)|urn:ietf:rfc:2945| |Hardware Token|URI:urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.0:am:HardwareToken| |SSL/TLS Certificate Based Client Authentication|urn:ietf:rfc:2246| |PGP Public Key|urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.0:am:PGP| |SPKI Public Key|urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.0:am:SPKI| |XKMS Public Key|urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.0:am:XKMS| |XML Digital Signature|urn:ietf:rfc:3075| |Unspecified|urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.0:am:unspecified| When the `authenticationMethod` parameter is `null`, the authentication method is set to `urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.0:am:unspecified`.
trans-unit.target: | Godkjenningsmetode | URI | |---------------------------|---------| | Passord | urn: oasis: navn: tc: SAML:1.0:am:password | | Kerberos | urn: ietf:rfc:1510 | | Sikre eksterne passordet (SRP) | urn: ietf:rfc:2945 | | Maskinvare Token | URI:urn:oasis:names:TC:SAML:1.0:AM:HardwareToken | | SSL/TLS basert klienten sertifikatgodkjenning | urn: ietf:rfc:2246 | | PGP fellesnøkkel | urn: oasis: navn: tc: SAML:1.0:am:PGP | | Fellesnøkkelen for SPKI | urn: oasis: navn: tc: SAML:1.0:am:SPKI | | Fellesnøkkelen for XKMS | urn: oasis: navn: tc: SAML:1.0:am:XKMS | | XML-Digital signatur | urn: ietf:rfc:3075 | | Uspesifisert | urn: oasis: navn: tc: SAML:1.0:am: Uspesifisert | Når den `authenticationMethod` parameteren er `null`, godkjenningsmetoden er satt til `urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.0:am:unspecified`.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSubject"></xref> that represents the subject of the claim.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSubject"> </xref> som representerer emnet for kravet.

trans-unit.source: A URI reference that specifies how the subject was authenticated.
trans-unit.target: URI-referanse som angir hvordan emnet ble godkjent.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.DateTime> that specifies the instant in time at which the subject was authenticated.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.DateTime>som angir til direkte med samme tidspunkt da emnet ble godkjent.</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: The DNS domain name in which the computer that authenticated the subject resides.
trans-unit.target: DNS-domenenavn som datamaskinen som godkjent emnet finnes.

trans-unit.source: The IP address of the computer that authenticated the subject.
trans-unit.target: Datamaskinen som godkjent emnet IP-adresse.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601> of type <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorityBinding"></xref> that contains additional information about the subject.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601> av typen <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorityBinding"> </xref> som inneholder tilleggsinformasjon om emnet.

trans-unit.source: authorityBindings contains a member that is .
trans-unit.target: authorityBindingsinneholder et medlem som .

trans-unit.source: Adds a claim based on the properties of this instance to the specified collection of claims.
trans-unit.target: Legger til et krav basert på egenskapene for denne forekomsten til den angitte objektsamlingen krav.

trans-unit.source: The AddClaimsToList method adds a claim to the `claims` parameter based on the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.AuthenticationInstant%2A>, <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.AuthenticationMethod%2A>, <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.AuthorityBindings%2A>, <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.ClaimType%2A>, <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.DnsAddress%2A>, <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.IPAddress%2A>, and properties.
trans-unit.target: Metoden AddClaimsToList legger til et krav til den `claims` parameteren basert på den <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.AuthenticationInstant%2A>, <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.AuthenticationMethod%2A>, <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.AuthorityBindings%2A>, <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.ClaimType%2A>, <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.DnsAddress%2A>, <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.IPAddress%2A>, og egenskaper.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.IPAddress%2A> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.DnsAddress%2A> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.ClaimType%2A> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.AuthorityBindings%2A> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.AuthenticationMethod%2A> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.AuthenticationInstant%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IList%601> of type <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Claims.Claim"></xref> that contains the set of claims to add to.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IList%601> av typen <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Claims.Claim"> </xref> som inneholder et krav til å legge til.

trans-unit.source: claims is .
trans-unit.target: claimsis .

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the instant in time at which the subject was authenticated.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir instant tidspunkt da emnet ble godkjent.

trans-unit.source: The time is stored in Coordinated Universal Time (UTC).
trans-unit.target: Klokkeslettet er lagret i Coordinated Universal Time (UTC).

trans-unit.source: The AuthenticationInstant property corresponds to the `AuthenticationInstant` attribute of the `<AuthenticationStatement>` element that is defined in the Assertions and Protocol for the OASIS Security Assertion Markup Language (SAML) specification.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen AuthenticationInstant samsvarer med den `AuthenticationInstant` for den `<AuthenticationStatement>` element som er definert i deklarasjoner og protokoll for spesifikasjonen OASIS sikkerhet deklarasjon Markup Language (SAML).

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.DateTime> that specifies the instant in time at which the subject was authenticated.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.DateTime>som angir til direkte med samme tidspunkt da emnet ble godkjent.</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: Exception type
trans-unit.target: Unntakstype

trans-unit.source: Condition
trans-unit.target: Betingelse

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.InvalidOperationException></xref:System.InvalidOperationException>

trans-unit.source: The AuthenticationInstant property is set and the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.IsReadOnly*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen AuthenticationInstant settes og <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.IsReadOnly*>egenskapen <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.IsReadOnly*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the method used to authenticate the subject.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir metoden som brukes til å godkjenne emnet.

trans-unit.source: The set of authentication methods is extensible; however the following table contains the set of authentication methods defined in the SAML specification.
trans-unit.target: Godkjenningsmetoder er omfattende; tabellen nedenfor inneholder imidlertid settet med godkjenningsmetoder som er definert i SAML-spesifikasjonen.

trans-unit.source: |Authentication method|URI| |---------------------------|---------| |Password|urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.0:am:password| |Kerberos|urn:ietf:rfc:1510| |Secure Remote Password (SRP)|urn:ietf:rfc:2945| |Hardware Token|URI:urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.0:am:HardwareToken| |SSL/TLS Certificate Based Client Authentication|urn:ietf:rfc:2246| |PGP Public Key|urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.0:am:PGP| |SPKI Public Key|urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.0:am:SPKI| |XKMS Public Key|urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.0:am:XKMS| |XML Digital Signature|urn:ietf:rfc:3075| |Unspecified|urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.0:am:unspecified| When the AuthenticationMethod property is set to `null`, the authentication method is set to `urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.0:am:unspecified`.
trans-unit.target: | Godkjenningsmetode | URI | |---------------------------|---------| | Passord | urn: oasis: navn: tc: SAML:1.0:am:password | | Kerberos | urn: ietf:rfc:1510 | | Sikre eksterne passordet (SRP) | urn: ietf:rfc:2945 | | Maskinvare Token | URI:urn:oasis:names:TC:SAML:1.0:AM:HardwareToken | | SSL/TLS basert klienten sertifikatgodkjenning | urn: ietf:rfc:2246 | | PGP fellesnøkkel | urn: oasis: navn: tc: SAML:1.0:am:PGP | | Fellesnøkkelen for SPKI | urn: oasis: navn: tc: SAML:1.0:am:SPKI | | Fellesnøkkelen for XKMS | urn: oasis: navn: tc: SAML:1.0:am:XKMS | | XML-Digital signatur | urn: ietf:rfc:3075 | | Uspesifisert | urn: oasis: navn: tc: SAML:1.0:am: Uspesifisert | Når egenskapen AuthenticationMethod er satt til `null`, godkjenningsmetoden er satt til `urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.0:am:unspecified`.

trans-unit.source: The AuthenticationMethod property corresponds to the `AuthenticationMethod` attribute of the `<AuthenticationStatement>` element that is defined in the Assertions and Protocol for the OASIS Security Assertion Markup Language (SAML) specification.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen AuthenticationMethod samsvarer med den `AuthenticationMethod` for den `<AuthenticationStatement>` element som er definert i deklarasjoner og protokoll for spesifikasjonen OASIS sikkerhet deklarasjon Markup Language (SAML).

trans-unit.source: The method used to authenticate the subject.
trans-unit.target: Metoden som brukes til å godkjenne emnet.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.0:am:unspecified" name="urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.0:am:unspecified" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er <xref uid="langword_csharp_urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.0:am:unspecified" name="urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.0:am:unspecified" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The AuthenticationMethod property is set and the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.IsReadOnly*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen AuthenticationMethod settes og <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.IsReadOnly*>egenskapen <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.IsReadOnly*>

trans-unit.source: Gets additional information about the subject.
trans-unit.target: Henter tilleggsinformasjon om emnet.

trans-unit.source: The AuthorityBindings property corresponds to a set of `<AuthorityBinding>` child elements for an `<AuthenticationStatement>` element that is defined in the Assertions and Protocol for the OASIS Security Assertion Markup Language (SAML) specification.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen AuthorityBindings tilsvarer et sett med `<AuthorityBinding>` underordnede elementer for en `<AuthenticationStatement>` element som er definert i deklarasjoner og protokoll for OASIS sikkerhet deklarasjon Markup Language (SAML)-spesifikasjonen.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IList%601> of type <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorityBinding"></xref> that contains additional information about the subject.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IList%601> av typen <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorityBinding"> </xref> som inneholder tilleggsinformasjon om emnet.

trans-unit.source: Gets the type of security claim.
trans-unit.target: Henter av krav for sikkerhet.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Claims.ClaimTypes"></xref> that specifies the type of security claim.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Claims.ClaimTypes"> </xref> som angir hvilken type krav for sikkerhet.

trans-unit.source: Always `http://schemas.microsoft.com/mb/2005/09/ClaimType/SamlAuthentication`.
trans-unit.target: Alltid `http://schemas.microsoft.com/mb/2005/09/ClaimType/SamlAuthentication`.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the DNS domain name in which the computer that authenticated the subject resides.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir DNS-domenenavnet der datamaskinen som godkjent emnet finnes.

trans-unit.source: The DnsAddress property corresponds to the `DNSAddress` attribute of the `<SubjectLocality>` element that is defined in the Assertions and Protocol for the OASIS Security Assertion Markup Language (SAML) specification.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen DnsAddress samsvarer med den `DNSAddress` for den `<SubjectLocality>` element som er definert i deklarasjoner og protokoll for spesifikasjonen OASIS sikkerhet deklarasjon Markup Language (SAML).

trans-unit.source: The DNS domain name in which the computer that authenticated the subject resides.
trans-unit.target: DNS-domenenavn som datamaskinen som godkjent emnet finnes.

trans-unit.source: The DnsAddress property is set and the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.IsReadOnly*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen DnsAddress settes og <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.IsReadOnly*>egenskapen <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.IsReadOnly*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the IP address of the computer that authenticated the subject.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir IP-adressen til datamaskinen som godkjent emnet.

trans-unit.source: The IPAddress property corresponds to the `IPAddress` attribute of the `<SubjectLocality>` element that is defined in the Assertions and Protocol for the OASIS Security Assertion Markup Language (SAML) specification.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen IPAddress samsvarer med den `IPAddress` for den `<SubjectLocality>` element som er definert i deklarasjoner og protokoll for spesifikasjonen OASIS sikkerhet deklarasjon Markup Language (SAML).

trans-unit.source: The IP address of the computer that authenticated the subject.
trans-unit.target: Datamaskinen som godkjent emnet IP-adresse.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the properties of this instance are read-only.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om egenskapene for denne forekomsten er skrivebeskyttet.

trans-unit.source: To make this instance of the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement> class read-only, call the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.MakeReadOnly%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Foreta denne forekomsten av den <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement>klassen skrivebeskyttet, kall av <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.MakeReadOnly%2A>metode.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.MakeReadOnly%2A> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the properties of this instance are read-only; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis egenskapene for denne forekomsten er skrivebeskyttet. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Causes this instance to be read-only.
trans-unit.target: Gjør denne forekomsten er skrivebeskyttet.

trans-unit.source: When the MakeReadOnly method is called, the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.IsReadOnly%2A> property is set to `true` and properties of this instance can no longer be set.
trans-unit.target: Når metoden MakeReadOnly kalles, den <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.IsReadOnly%2A>er satt til `true` og kan ikke angi egenskapene for denne forekomsten.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.IsReadOnly%2A>

trans-unit.source: Reads the SAML authentication statement from the specified XML reader.
trans-unit.target: Leser uttrykket SAML godkjenning fra den angitte XML-leseren.

trans-unit.source: The ReadXml method sets the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.AuthenticationInstant%2A>, <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.AuthenticationMethod%2A>, <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.AuthorityBindings%2A>, <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.DnsAddress%2A>, <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.IPAddress%2A>, and properties.
trans-unit.target: ReadXml metoden angir den <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.AuthenticationInstant%2A>, <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.AuthenticationMethod%2A>, <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.AuthorityBindings%2A>, <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.DnsAddress%2A>, <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.IPAddress%2A>, og egenskaper.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.IPAddress%2A> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.DnsAddress%2A> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.AuthorityBindings%2A> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.AuthenticationMethod%2A> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.AuthenticationInstant%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReader> to read the SAML authentication statement.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReader>til å lese SAML godkjenning.</xref:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReader>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSerializer"></xref> that is capable of reading XML elements in the SAML authentication statement that is defined in the SAML specification.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSerializer"> </xref> som er i stand til lesing av XML-elementer i SAML godkjenning uttrykket som er definert i SAML-spesifikasjonen.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer"></xref> that reads the <xref uid="langword_csharp_KeyInfo" name="KeyInfo" href=""></xref> clause of the digital signature.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer"> </xref> som leses av <xref uid="langword_csharp_KeyInfo" name="KeyInfo" href=""> </xref> digital signatur-setningsdelen.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver"></xref> that determines the security token that created the digital signature.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver"> </xref> som bestemmer sikkerhetstokenet som opprettet meldingens digitale signatur.

trans-unit.source: reader is -or- samlSerializer is
trans-unit.target: readeris -or- samlSerializer is

trans-unit.source: reader refers to an XML element that does not contain the and attributes.
trans-unit.target: readerrefererer til et XML-element som ikke inneholder den og attributter.

trans-unit.source: -or- reader refers to an XML element that does not have a child element.
trans-unit.target: - eller - reader refererer til et XML-element som ikke har en underordnet element.

trans-unit.source: Writes the SAML authentication statement into the specified XML serializer.
trans-unit.target: Skriver uttrykket SAML godkjenning til den angitte XML-serialiseringen.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryWriter> to write the SAML authentication statement.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryWriter>å skrive uttrykket SAML godkjenning.</xref:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryWriter>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSerializer"></xref> that is capable of writing XML elements in a SAML assertion.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSerializer"> </xref> som er i stand til å skrive XML-elementer i en SAML-deklarasjon.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer"></xref> that is capable of writing <xref uid="langword_csharp_KeyInfo" name="KeyInfo" href=""></xref> clauses.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer"> </xref> som er i stand til skriving <xref uid="langword_csharp_KeyInfo" name="KeyInfo" href=""> </xref> setningsdeler.

trans-unit.source: writer is -or- samlSerializer is .
trans-unit.target: writeris -or- samlSerializer is .
